    NetLib
    Defined structures and constants needed to use the Palm NetLibrary
    NetLib.NetSocketAddrEnum
    Defined the various types of sockets address.
    NetLib.NetSocketDirEnum  
    NetLib.NetSocketOptEnum
    Option constants that can be passed to NetSocketOptionSet and NetSocketOptionGet When an option is set or retrieved, both the level of the option and the option number must be specified.
    NetLib.NetSocketOptLevelEnum
    Option levels for SocketOptionSet and SocketOptionGet
    NetLib.NetSocketProtocolEnum
    Network Protocols supported
    NetLib.NetSocketTypeEnum
    Types of sockets
    NetSocketAddrType
    Structure used to hold a generic socket address.

    SystemFeatures
    Defines system features we can test for in our device.
    The main feature used will probably be the ROM version so we have provided a method to easily get it, but any Palm or Handspring feature can be determined using the Palm.FtrGet method and these parameters
